#summary Learn how to configure SEA3D in mobile device using Flash Builder.

*Configuration*

Add the tags in the `Main-app.xml` of your application in Flash Builder.

{{{
<renderMode>direct</renderMode> 

<depthAndStencil>true</depthAndStencil>

<autoOrients>false</autoOrients>

<aspectRatio>landscape</aspectRatio>

<fullScreen>true</fullScreen>
}}}
